answers.answer: You have palpitations and this will require further evaluation with a 24 or 48 hour Holter monitor.  see your primary care physician who will be able to order that for you.  Most of the time this is a benin condition and does not require therapy.  In time, these symptoms resovle.  occasionally, however, medical therapy with heart rate slowing medicaitons is necessary in a rare number of cases.  Relaxation is helpful as well.  Frequently these symptoms occur in those who have heightened anxiety level.  Very rarely is this condition serious enough to cause serious problems or require additional aggressive therapy.
